full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB CING GTOR MA 'BUL BA'I RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG GIS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING, RGYUD SDE DANG LOG CHOS MANG POS MA SLAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING CHA TSANG BAR BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB CING GTOR MA 'BUL BA'I RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG GIS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING, RGYUD SDE DANG LOG CHOS MANG POS MA SLAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING CHA TSANG BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS GNOD SBYIN GANG BA BZANG PO'I GANGS MA GNAS RIN CHEN 'BAR BA'I SDIGS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
